Articles.Content:
Do you have mission plans? Do you want to find out if other people think that the idea is sane? Then you have come to the right place!

My question is if this sounds sane or insane

Corvus 1-3 Alpha 1

Roster: Jebediah K, Bill K, Bob K, Valentina K.

Mission plans:

Corvus 1: bring Tito K to 300 Km and return

Corvus 3: Launch Val and Bill to orbit

Corvus 2: Launch Jeb into orbit to rendezvous with C3 and transfer bill over

Once Val is alone, she will de-orbit and recover

Alpha I: Launch and rendezvous with Corvus 2 and dock, then de-orbit C2
Craziest-sounding mission I ever attempted: taking a suborbital EVA report in Jool's atmosphere and returning the kerbonaut to my Laythe ground colony.

Craziest-sounding mission I ever attempted: taking a suborbital EVA report in Jool's atmosphere and returning the kerbonaut to my Laythe ground colony.

This is genius. How'd you do it?

This is genius. How'd you do it?

Easiest way would be to enter very low orbit then reduce Pe let atmosphere lower Ap or do a small burn. Do measures and burn straight up to raise Ap

Hardest part is getting into low Jool orbit

Define 'low Jool orbit'.

210 km or just above the atmosphere, has not visited Jool since 1.03 so not sure how easy its to aerobrake down from laythe to this.
